lines.text: Shall I hit him again Adam?
Only if you want to.
Earl Grey tea bags.
What?
You didn't get any.
Why would I get *you* Earl Grey tea bags?
I like them.
Look, we have a flat share, okay? We are not married!
Is Earl Grey tea bags married?
Oh, yes!
Didn't we bug this suite when Bill Clinton used it?
We did.
Happy days!
Oh, shag.
You know, back in my days as a student radical, our dreams were all about the glorious proletariat.
We've still got those dreams on file somewhere.

[decides to sacrifice himself]
You will never win. Acts of Hate often bring forth Acts of Love and so you will never win. In another World, you might be tied to this chair and I might be holding the gun. So I suppose you've been unlucky. But you will never win.

[infuriated, embarrassed]
I'm... unlucky?
Danny, don't!
If I weren't tied to this chair, I would be up in your face, you Death-Worshipping Fascist!
And you know what my answer would be.
[Shoots Danny in the back of the head]
...before he got religion - if world anarchy *is* a religion.
The great joy of an obo post is that the Powers That Be can't see how much you're drinking.
We're in a state of collective desperation here.
Little tinkering Tom here is responsible for this mess!
Lively on this side of the river, isn't it?
Bug your own office, do you, Harry?
Only for special occasions.
Colin, when the word "Yes" will do, use it.
I was just shoring up an asset.
Oh, is that what they're calling it these days?

[confronting Calum]
I've met a lot of people like you. Piss-takers. You go through life finding everything so easy you think it's all a joke.
I may not be able to do everything I want to do to you, but there is a lot I can do.
Suicides' a bit extreme even for an Aston Villa fan, don't you think?
What?
Your shirt! It's Villa, right? Football. It's one of the finer things in life.
The Mullah said that for a martyr Allah would intercede for 10 loved ones...
Well, what do you think? I think the only way we will see Paradise is if we build it here. Come on, you know it's true. You know it.
[moves his hand]
He's going to go!
And you brought little terrier Tom along with you, what a nice surprise...
Are we going to have to come over the river and potty-train you people?
They're making a map of Secret Britain. They want the public to know just how much is being kept from them. I quite agree with them, actually.
And so you just handed it over! Without a thought that they might be working against us.
What's going to happen to me?
Bad things.
[Tom and Danny leave. The Desk Officer starts to tremble and puts his head in his hands]

[comprehensively beats up a tail]
Follow me again, and I'll get really cross.
They're going to kill us.
At least we're together, Danny.
He's done it!
[Smiles, then his face falls]
[Having swerved the car into the middle of a deserted public square, Adam Carter leaps out. The bomb detonates. Adam Carter disappears into the fireball mid-run]
So how did it go?
[Harry is silent]
Oh, that's right, I forgot. I'm a Civilian, now!
...You are.
You're so young! Too young to be wasting your life with this nonsense...

[Still typing away, close to the incriminating data]
It's my duty.
[She garrottes him to death with a ring-wire]
I was on an operation where a Conscience exploded. Five people died.
This job is a Machine that chews up good people and then spits them out!
How old are you?
Why?
You look like someone I knew.
It's not a nice feeling, is it?
So how much information do you have on this Shining Dawn?
About as much as you had on Al Qaeda when they were sunning themselves in Florida and learning how to fly.
We don't have to understand them, we just have to stop them.
You dropped your potato-peeler.
Because of what we are, we have to watch each other, as much as that pains us.

[trying to talk someone out of getting himself shot by Special Forces]
They want you to self-destruct!
There's not a Soldier in Britain would shoot me!
Green light!

[offers handshake]
We could have been friends in another life!

[declines]
It'll just have to wait until then.
I know you may find this hard to believe, but there are more important people in the World than your Boss.

You journalists do it to make some point about morality, but we're just trying to make the World safer. And do you know how much we get paid to do all this running around in the dark? You don't wanna know.

[hunting a Rogue Agent]
I didn't choose you for this mission because of your skills, but because you have absolutely nothing to lose.

[agitated, thinks the World is ending and that he has contracted a disease via a biological weapon]
All things that are of any worth, think on those things...

[holding up the Grid with a detonator]
Things were better back when this Country was more Christian.
It's a living.
There are no medals for what we do. But what we do give is respect. And that you have. I know Agents twice your age who couldn't go through what you did.
You said you'd keep me safe.
I'm so sorry.
We don't have anyone of your background.
Does that mean race?
Yes.

[examines Spykit]
Is this necessary? This Chocolate Box James Bondery?
We have procedures for this!
I found this in the Student Bookshop.
[gives Tom a Koran]
throw out enough guesses, eventually you'll get something right.
Any ideas?
We could stop selling arms to the regimes so these people stop escaping over here, but since that's not going to happen...

[Character opens a Manila Envelope and finds photos of a hit]
Are you happy with your wash?
Thanks for letting us have first bite at the rotten apple.
Colin, tell me something uplifting.
It's looking to be the driest Autumn on record.
Do you want to be taken out and shot?
Do you ever wonder about this path we've chosen?
Everybody out! There is BLUE ASBESTOS in the Building!
...You're burning me?
Do you know where you are?
No.
Exactly.
I miss my wife, but that doesn't mean I'm wrong about this.
Dolce et decorum est pro patria mori.
It was just an ear stud.
It's a honeytrap and it's naff!
Naff can work.

[World is Ending]
We should be with our Loved Ones! Even if that is just a Cat...
I will say it for your ear only. The fruit of the Zaqqum Tree shall be the sinners' food.
Is that your wife? Be brave for her.
[burns off her wrist restraints with a steam iron]
What's an MI5 Pretty Boy got that I haven't?
I think you answered your own question.
[mobile rings]
Will you turn that off, I mean, really!
What do you do for a living, Madam? I personally bugger skinheads, so kindly do not tell me what I can and can't do.
